title: The Colorful Clownfish
description: Clownfish are brightly colored fish known for their symbiotic relationship with sea anemones. They are found in the warmer waters of the Indian and Pacific oceans.

questions.question: What protects a clownfish from the stinging tentacles of a sea anemone?
options: A hard, armored shell
A special type of scale
A slimy mucus layer on its skin
They are immune to the sting
questions.correct_answer: A slimy mucus layer on its skin

questions.question: What is the primary benefit of the relationship between a clownfish and a sea anemone?
options: The clownfish provides the anemone with food
The anemone provides the clownfish with protection and food
They communicate using a special language
They attract mates for each other
questions.correct_answer: The anemone provides the clownfish with protection and food

questions.question: Clownfish are born what gender?
options: Male
Female
They are born without a gender
They are both male and female

questions.question: What is the collective noun for a group of clownfish?
options: A swarm
A school
A pod
A flock

questions.question: In a group of clownfish, what happens if the dominant female dies?
options: A new female joins the group
The largest male will change gender to become the new female
The group breaks apart
The group will remain without a female
questions.correct_answer: The largest male will change gender to become the new female
